name: Meadow of Dreams
description:
Warning: The game contains scenes of violence.

Meadow of Dreams is a 3D Role playing Game which puts you, the protagonist, in the shoes of a city boy or girl attempting to revive a farm left abandoned after the death of the previous owner.

The game integrates some visual novel elements such as the unlocking of CGs which can be viewed from the main menu at any time.
The main goal of the game is to unlock at least one of the three endings, after that, the possibility to start a "New game+" will be offered, that will allow the player to collect the remaining CGs, scenes and endings with more ease.

Features:
  • 15 unlockable CGs and over 20 scenes with various characters.
  • Three endings, the easiest to get takes around two hours.
  • 8 Characters you can form a relationship with.
  • Various hidden secrets, a mystery to solve and much more!
